title: Teacher Trainer
loc: The Carter Center Mental Health Office in Partnership with BrainU Lab
description_1: Trained trainers and teachers in neuroscience and mental health

description_3: Co-wrote and adapted sessions for Liberian context.

title: Student Friendly Schools Co-Facilitator
description_1: Co-coordinated a workshop utilizing school administrators as facilitators in a workshop designed to build positive student-teacher relationships and reduce corporal punishment.Wrote and facilitated sessions using a strengths-based approach.
description_2: Topics included relationship-building, emotional regulation, positive conflict resolution, corporal punishment reduction, growth mindset, and gender stereotype perception.
description_3: Collected qualitative data on school administration attitudes regarding school pregnancy in 2016, wrote session in 2017, toured the country facilitating session in 2018.
